chthrapatiye kathawa wenne nam yaluwo thundenek athara wena kathawak.weronika kiyanne landan wala jiwath wena sellakkara ganu lamayek.jiwithe gana saralawa hithena hithuna de karana kenek.eyata hambawena yaluwa mira kiyanne weronikata wada wenasma kenek gathipawathum walin usas kenek.me kathawata ena thunwaniya thamayi gautham eyath sellakara jiwithayak gatha karana tharunayen.ekama jathiye ayane ekata ekathu wenne neda weronika ha gautham denna kohomin kohoma hari yaluwela ekata inna patan gannawa.dennama ekama widiyata hithanne ekama gathipawathum thiyenne ee nisa ee dennata denna hodayi.habayi weronikage hodama yaluwa mirata gautham ge hitha yanawa.mokada eya hitha athulen eyata hoyanne yahapath gathi pawathum thiyana ganu lamayek nisa.ee serama mirage gawa thiyanawa.mirath gauthamge aadarayata awanatha wenna patan gannawa.ganu lamayi dennek ekama pirimi lamayekta aadaraya karanawa habayi eyage aadare thiyenne ethanin eka ganu lamayekta witharayi...methanin passe mona weyida yalukama kiyana deta aadaraya ekathu unama api hithannewath nathi dewal wenna puluwan.gautham weronika mira me thundena athara diwena aadara kathawa koktel mema chithrapatiyen obata narambaanna puluwan.
